column4: do anyone know how i can change the background color of my desktop panes, or preferably of one of my desktop panes?
Do you want to change the theme of your panel?
i want to be able just to change the pane color of my current, or any, theme
Well im not so sure if you can do that... but rightclick on desktop then go to change desktop background... then theme then comstomize... and see if you can change something
